languages.text: "Я... была там, понимаешь?" {n}Джай осекается и бессильно указывает на вход в покои гемункула.{/n} "Меня там... резали. Многорукий ашмаг отнял мое дыхание! Сначала отрезал голову, да так, что я живая была и в сознании — висела на проводах и смотрела, что он с телом творит! Он вынул имплант — весь, и горло, и легкие! Потом взял кусок плоти, возился с ним, потом пришил... и все вернулось!" {n}Джай заходится надрывным кашлем — на ладонях, которыми она прикрывает рот, расцветают кровавые капли.{/n} "Я умираю, {name}! Снова умираю!"

traits.locale_text: "Я... была там, понимаешь?" {n}Джай осекается и бессильно указывает на вход в покои гемункула.{/n} "Меня там... резали. Многорукий ашмаг отнял мое дыхание! Сначала отрезал голову, да так, что я живая была и в сознании — висела на проводах и смотрела, что он с телом творит! Он вынул имплант — весь, и горло, и легкие! Потом взял кусок плоти, возился с ним, потом пришил... и все вернулось!" {n}Джай заходится надрывным кашлем — на ладонях, которыми она прикрывает рот, расцветают кровавые капли.{/n} "Я умираю, {name}! Снова умираю!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "I... was in there, you understand?" {n}Jae breaks off and helplessly points at the entrance to the Haemonculus's chamber.{/n} "That's where he... cut me. The many-armed ashmag took away my breath! He started by cutting off my head, but I was alive and conscious. I hung from the wires and watched what he did to my body! He took out the implant, the throat, and the lungs, the whole thing! Then he grabbed a chunk of flesh, messed with it, sewed it into place... And everything came back!" {n}Jae is overcome by a hacking cough, flecks of blood on her hands when she draws them away from her mouth.{/n} "I'm dying, {name}! Dying again!"
languages.original_text: "Я... была там, понимаешь?" {n}Джай осекается и бессильно указывает на вход в покои гемункула.{/n} "Меня там... резали. Многорукий ашмаг отнял мое дыхание! Сначала отрезал голову, да так, что я живая была и в сознании — висела на проводах и смотрела, что он с телом творит! Он вынул имплант — весь, и горло, и легкие! Потом взял кусок плоти, возился с ним, потом пришил... и все вернулось!" {n}Джай заходится надрывным кашлем — на ладонях, которыми она прикрывает рот, расцветают кровавые капли.{/n} "Я умираю, {name}! Снова умираю!"

traits.locale_text: "I... was there, you see?" {n}Jae breaks off and helplessly points at the entrance to the haemonculus's chamber.{/n} "That's where he... cut me. The many-armed ashmag took away my breath! He started by cutting off my head, but I was alive and conscious — I hanged from the wires and watched what he was doing to the body! He took out the implant, the throat, and the lungs, the entire thing! Then he took a chunk of flesh, messed with it, sewed it into place... And everything came back!" {n}Jai is struggling with a tearing cough, flecks of blood blossoming on the hands she is covering her mouth with.{/n} "I am dying, {name}! Dying again!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I... was there, you see?" {n}Jae breaks off and helplessly points at the entrance to the haemonculus's chamber.{/n} "That's where he... cut me. He took out the implant, the throat, and the lungs, the whole thing! Then he grabbed a chunk of flesh, messed with it, sewed it into place... And everything came back!" {n}Jae is overcome by a hacking cough, flecks of blood on her hands when she draws them away from her mouth.{/n} "I'm dying, {name}! Dying again!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「あたしは…そこにいたんだ。わかる？」{n}ジェイは言葉を切り、力なくハモンキュラスの部屋の入り口を指差す。{/n}「そこでアッシュマグに…切り刻まれた。多足野郎はあたしを殺したんだ！ヤツはまずあたしの頭を切り落とした。でもまだ生きていたし、意識もあった。ワイヤーにぶら下がり、ヤツが体に何をするのか見ていた！ヤツはインプラント、喉、肺、すべてを取り出した！そして肉の塊をつかんで、それをいじり、縫い合わせた…それから元の位置に戻したんだ！」{n}ジェイは猛烈な咳をし、手を口から離すと、血の斑点が浮かんでいる。{/n}「あたしは死ぬんだよ、{name}様！もう一度ね！」
languages.original_text: "I... was in there, you understand?" {n}Jae breaks off and helplessly points at the entrance to the Haemonculus's chamber.{/n} "That's where he... cut me. The many-armed ashmag took away my breath! He started by cutting off my head, but I was alive and conscious. I hung from the wires and watched what he did to my body! He took out the implant, the throat, and the lungs, the whole thing! Then he grabbed a chunk of flesh, messed with it, sewed it into place... And everything came back!" {n}Jae is overcome by a hacking cough, flecks of blood on her hands when she draws them away from her mouth.{/n} "I'm dying, {name}! Dying again!"

traits.locale_text: 「あたしは…そこにいたんだ。わかる？」{n}ジェイは言葉を切り、力なくハモンキュラスの部屋の入り口を指差す。{/n}「そこでアッシュマグに…切り刻まれた。多足野郎はあたしを殺したんだ！ヤツはまずあたしの頭を切り落とした。でもまだ生きていたし、意識もあった。ワイヤーにぶら下がり、ヤツが体に何をするのか見ていた！ヤツはインプラント、喉、肺、すべてを取り出した！そして肉の塊をつかんで、それをいじり、縫い合わせた…それから元の位置に戻したんだ！」{n}ジェイは猛烈な咳をし、手を口から離すと、血の斑点が浮かんでいる。{/n}「あたしは死ぬんだよ、{name}様！もう一度ね！」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “我……之前就在里面，你知道吗？”{n}婕伊住了口，无助地指着血伶人房间的入口。{/n}“这就是那个人……切割我……的地方，那个浑身长手的坏种让我无法呼吸！他先砍掉了我的头，可我还活着，意识也很清醒。我被吊在铁丝上，眼睁睁地看着他收拾我的身体！他取走了我的植入物，拿走了我的喉咙和肺，把所有的东西都拿走了！随后他抓过来一块肉，一顿摆弄，缝到了我的身体上……然后那些东西就又回来了！”{n}婕伊的话被剧烈的咳嗽打断了。她用手捂住嘴，手上鲜血斑斑。{/n}“我要死了，{name}！我又要死了！”
languages.original_text: "I... was in there, you understand?" {n}Jae breaks off and helplessly points at the entrance to the Haemonculus's chamber.{/n} "That's where he... cut me. The many-armed ashmag took away my breath! He started by cutting off my head, but I was alive and conscious. I hung from the wires and watched what he did to my body! He took out the implant, the throat, and the lungs, the whole thing! Then he grabbed a chunk of flesh, messed with it, sewed it into place... And everything came back!" {n}Jae is overcome by a hacking cough, flecks of blood on her hands when she draws them away from her mouth.{/n} "I'm dying, {name}! Dying again!"

traits.locale_text: “我……之前就在里面，你知道吗？”{n}婕伊住了口，无助地指着血伶人房间的入口。{/n}“这就是那个人……切割我……的地方，那个浑身长手的坏家伙让我无法呼吸！他先砍掉了我的头，可我还活着，意识也很清醒。我被吊在铁丝上，眼睁睁地看着他收拾我的身体！他取走了我的植入物，拿走了我的喉咙和肺，把所有的东西都拿走了！随后他抓过来一块肉，一顿摆弄，缝到了我的身体上……然后那些东西就又回来了！”{n}婕伊剧烈地咳嗽着，她用手捂住嘴，手上鲜血斑斑。{/n}“我要死了，{name}！我又要死了！”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «He... estado allí, ¿sabe?». {n}Jae se queda en silencio y señala con impotencia a la entrada de los aposentos del Hemónculo.{/n} «Ahí es donde me... cortó. ¡El ashmag de muchos brazos me arrebató el aire! Empezó cortándome la cabeza, pero seguía viva y consciente. ¡Me colgó de unos cables y me hizo mirar lo que le hacía a mi cuerpo! Sacó el implante, la garganta, los pulmones, ¡todo! Después cogió un pedazo de carne, le hizo algo, lo cosió en su sitio... ¡y me lo devolvió todo!».{n} Jae sufre una tos espantosa que hace que le salten las lágrimas y, cuando separa las manos de la boca, ves que están moteadas por gotas de sangre.{/n} «¡Me muero, {name}! ¡Me estoy muriendo otra vez!».
languages.original_text: "I... was in there, you understand?" {n}Jae breaks off and helplessly points at the entrance to the Haemonculus's chamber.{/n} "That's where he... cut me. The many-armed ashmag took away my breath! He started by cutting off my head, but I was alive and conscious. I hung from the wires and watched what he did to my body! He took out the implant, the throat, and the lungs, the whole thing! Then he grabbed a chunk of flesh, messed with it, sewed it into place... And everything came back!" {n}Jae is overcome by a hacking cough, flecks of blood on her hands when she draws them away from her mouth.{/n} "I'm dying, {name}! Dying again!"

traits.locale_text: «He... estado allí, ¿sabes?». {n}Jae se queda en silencio y señala con impotencia a la entrada de los aposentos del Hemónculo.{/n} «Ahí es donde me... cortó. ¡El ashmag de muchos brazos me arrebató el aire! Empezó cortándome la cabeza, pero seguía viva y consciente. ¡Me colgó de unos cables y me hizo mirar lo que le hacía a mi cuerpo! Sacó el implante, la garganta, los pulmones, ¡todo! Después cogió un pedazo de carne, le hizo algo, lo cosió en su sitio... ¡y me lo devolvió todo!».{n} Jae sufre una tos que hace que le salten las lágrimas y unas gotas de sangre manchan la mano con la que se cubre la boca.{/n} «¡Me muero, {name}! ¡Me estoy muriendo otra vez!».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ich war da drin, versteht Ihr?" {n}Jae bricht ab und deutet hilflos auf den Eingang zur Kammer des Haemonculus.{/n} "Dort hat er mich ... aufgeschnitten. Der vielarmige Ashmag hat mir den Atem geraubt! Er hat damit angefangen, dass er mir den Kopf abgeschnitten hat, aber ich war am Leben und bei Bewusstsein. Ich hing an den Drähten und habe zugesehen, was er mit dem Körper macht! Er hat das Implantat herausgenommen, den Rachen, die Lunge, das ganze Ding! Dann hat er ein Stück Fleisch genommen, daran herumgemacht, es hineingenäht ... Und dann alles wieder hinein!" {n}Jae wird von einem keuchenden Husten geschüttelt. Ihre Hände sind blutig, als sie sie vom Mund nimmt.{/n} "Ich sterbe, {name}! Schon wieder!"
languages.original_text: "I... was in there, you understand?" {n}Jae breaks off and helplessly points at the entrance to the Haemonculus's chamber.{/n} "That's where he... cut me. The many-armed ashmag took away my breath! He started by cutting off my head, but I was alive and conscious. I hung from the wires and watched what he did to my body! He took out the implant, the throat, and the lungs, the whole thing! Then he grabbed a chunk of flesh, messed with it, sewed it into place... And everything came back!" {n}Jae is overcome by a hacking cough, flecks of blood on her hands when she draws them away from her mouth.{/n} "I'm dying, {name}! Dying again!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... war dort, wisst Ihr?" {n}Jae bricht ab und deutet hilflos auf den Eingang zur Kammer des Haemonculus.{/n} "Dort hat er mich ... aufgeschnitten. Der vielarmige Ashmag hat mir den Atem geraubt! Er hat damit angefangen, dass er mir den Kopf abgeschnitten hat, aber ich war am Leben und bei Bewusstsein. Ich hing an den Drähten und habe zugesehen, was er mit dem Körper macht! Er hat das Implantat herausgenommen, den Rachen, die Lunge, das ganze Ding! Dann hat er ein Stück Fleisch genommen, daran herumgemacht, es hineingenäht ... Und dann alles wieder hinein!" {n}Jai wird von einem heftigen Hustenanfall durchgeschüttelt. Auf den Händen, die sie sich vor den Mund hält, erblühen Blutflecken.{/n} "Ich sterbe, {name}! Ich sterbe schon wieder!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « J'étais... là-dedans, vous voyez ? {n}Jae s'interrompt et désigne les quartiers de l'hémoncule.{/n} C'est là qu'il m'a... découpée. Avec tous ses bras, cet ashmag m'a fait arrêter de respirer ! Il a commencé par me couper la tête, mais j'étais toujours vivante et parfaitement consciente de mon environnement. Il m'a suspendue à des câbles et m'a forcée à regarder ce qu'il faisait à mon corps ! Il a arraché mon implant, ma gorge, mes poumons, tout ! Et après, il a bidouillé un truc avec un morceau de chair avant de le recoudre à sa place... et tout est revenu ! » {n}Jae est interrompue par une nouvelle quinte de toux, qui constelle sa main de gouttelettes de sang.{/n} « Je suis en train de crever, {name} ! Pour la deuxième fois ! »
languages.original_text: "I... was in there, you understand?" {n}Jae breaks off and helplessly points at the entrance to the Haemonculus's chamber.{/n} "That's where he... cut me. The many-armed ashmag took away my breath! He started by cutting off my head, but I was alive and conscious. I hung from the wires and watched what he did to my body! He took out the implant, the throat, and the lungs, the whole thing! Then he grabbed a chunk of flesh, messed with it, sewed it into place... And everything came back!" {n}Jae is overcome by a hacking cough, flecks of blood on her hands when she draws them away from her mouth.{/n} "I'm dying, {name}! Dying again!"

traits.locale_text: « J'étais... là, vous voyez ? {n}Jae s'interrompt et désigne les quartiers de l'hémoncule.{/n} C'est là qu'il m'a... découpée. Avec tous ses bras, cet ashmag m'a fait arrêter de respirer ! Il a commencé par me couper la tête, mais j'étais toujours vivante et parfaitement consciente de mon environnement. Il m'a suspendue à des câbles et m'a forcé à regarder ce qu'il faisait à mon corps ! Il a retiré mon implant, ma gorge, mes poumons, tout ! Après, il a bidouillé un truc avec un morceau de chair avant de le recoudre à sa place... et tout est revenu ! » {n}Jae tente en vain de réprimer une nouvelle quinte de toux, constellant sa main de gouttelettes de sang.{/n} « Je suis en train de mourir, {name} ! Pour la deuxième fois ! »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ben... Oradaydım, anlıyor musun?" {n}Duraksayan Jae, elinde olmadan Haimonkulus'un olduğu yerin girişini işaret ediyor.{/n} "İşte orada beni... Kesti. O çok kollu külboğaz, nefesimi benden aldı! Kesmeye kafamdan başladı ama yaşıyordum, bilincim yerindeydi. Beni kablolara astı ve bedenime yaptıklarını seyretti! İmplantımı, boğazımı, ciğerlerimi... Her şeyimi söktü attı! Sonra bir parça et aldı, onunla biraz uğraştı, buraya dikti ve... Kâbus geri döndü!" {n}Jae, kuru bir öksürüğe yenik düşüyor. Ağzından çektiği ellerinin üzerinde kan damlaları beliriyor.{/n} "Ölüyorum {name}! Yine ölüyorum!"
languages.original_text: "I... was in there, you understand?" {n}Jae breaks off and helplessly points at the entrance to the Haemonculus's chamber.{/n} "That's where he... cut me. The many-armed ashmag took away my breath! He started by cutting off my head, but I was alive and conscious. I hung from the wires and watched what he did to my body! He took out the implant, the throat, and the lungs, the whole thing! Then he grabbed a chunk of flesh, messed with it, sewed it into place... And everything came back!" {n}Jae is overcome by a hacking cough, flecks of blood on her hands when she draws them away from her mouth.{/n} "I'm dying, {name}! Dying again!"

traits.locale_text: "Ben... Oradaydım, anlıyor musun?" {n}Jae, duraksayarak elinde olmadan Haimonkulus'un odasının girişini işaret ediyor.{/n} "İşte orada beni... Kesti. O çok kollu külboğaz, nefesimi benden aldı! Kesmeye kafamdan başladı ama yaşıyordum, bilincim yerindeydi. Beni kablolara astı ve bedenime yaptıklarını seyretti! İmplantımı, boğazımı, ciğerlerimi... Her şeyimi söktü attı! Sonra bir parça et aldı, onunla biraz uğraştı, buraya dikti ve... Kâbus geri döndü!" {n}Jae, kuru bir öksürüğe yenik düşüyor. Ağzından çektiği ellerinin üzerinde kan damlaları beliriyor.{/n} "Ölüyorum {name}! Yine ölüyorum!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
